name: Adorable Girls
description:
Introduction

Adorable Girls is a puzzle game, where you need to restore pictures of adorable girls - piece by piece. Relaxing gameplay, based on watching dozens of beautiful girls (and solving puzzles, of cause). Every solved puzzle opens new and new charming pictures in your gallery. And if some puzzles will be too much tangled - ingame assistant always will solve them for you in one click.

Features

  • 18 adorable girls
  • 50+ charming pictures of them
  • Friendly-will-solve-them-for-u assistant
  • 1-handed gameplay
  • Solve puzzles and chill
